RelationalDatabase

Class Decompositions

  • java.lang.Object
    • RelationalDatabase.Decompositions

  • public class Decompositions
extends java.lang.Object
    The Decomposition Class provides us with the methods to decompose a relation to a higher Normal From.

      • decomposeInto2NFScheme

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Relation> decomposeInto2NFScheme(Relation relation)
        Decomposes a relation to relation that will satisfy 2nd Normal Form
        Parameters:
        relation - A Relation Class object we wish to decompose to 2NF.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Relation Objects whcih are in 2nd Normal Form or higher
